title: Grime and Punishment
description: Guest Bailiff David Rees joins us to talk about whether or not a married couple should hire a housecleaner. GOING DEEP with David Rees returns for its second season tonight on the Esquire Network!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
